This tests whether a ServiceWorker can receive and send shared memory objects. Whether it should be able to do so depends on the embedding.

Output will appear below. In addition to informational and "OK" lines there are lines about exceptions and errors. Two forms of output are expected:

  • No lines reading EXCEPTION SEEN and no lines reading ERROR means transmission is allowed and memory is shared properly.
  • Two lines reading EXCEPTION SEEN and nothing else means transmission is blocked in both directions.

For any other type of output, consult the code.
